message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a good starting point!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's be realistic. I propose a 60/40 split for me.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round!
Let's be reasonable, Bob. We're both losing value with each round. A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go. Accept and we can both get something!
